PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-04652017-05-05,  ,  ,  TBS,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Government Contracts Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS in order to address the issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations such as : (1) Clarifying the 2011 Regulatory Impact Analysis Statement; (2) Correcting wording in the French version of the Regulations; and (3) Updating the exception for pardons.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0082 Publication Date: 2017-05-17
AttachmentsAttachment
